## Task One
The mean life expectancy is <round(mean(gapminder$lifeExp), digits = 2)>
```{r}
lexp_mean <- round(mean(gapminder$lifeExp), digits = 2)
lexp_mean
lexp_sd <- round(sd(gapminder$lifeExp), digits = 2)
lexp_med <- round(median(gapminder$lifeExp), digits = 2)
lexp_sample <- length(gapminder$lifeExp)
```
years (standard deviation = ```lexp_sd```, median = ```lexp_med```, and the sample size is ```lexp_sample```)
